Name: Maple Old Fashioned
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A spirit-forward sipper that's rich and easy with bourbon mellowed by maple syrup.
History: I first encountered the bourbon-based Maple Old Fashioned in 2004 at Indigo Yard in Edinburgh, Scotland but in more recent years, rum seems to have taken over as the preferred spirit base to make a Maple Rum Old Fashioned . Whichever spirit base you use, makes a delicious riff on the classic Old-Fashioned .
Nutrition: One serving of Maple Old Fashioned contains 195 calories
